scripts.zip: echo building release-$npm_package_version.zip... && zip -jr release-$npm_package_version.zip dist && echo done
scripts.tar: echo building release-$npm_package_version.tar.gz... && tar -zcf release-$npm_package_version.tar.gz dist && echo done
scripts.zip2: echo building release-$VERSION.zip... && zip -jr release-$VERSION.zip dist && echo done
scripts.tar2: echo building release-$VERSION.tar.gz... && tar -zcf release-$VERSION.tar.gz dist && echo done
scripts.compress: zip -jr release-$VERSION.zip dist && tar -zcf release-$VERSION.tar.gz dist
